ygData.subject: Re: Tinkered items we know how to make, things we have therioes on and just rumor
ygData.msgSnippet: Damn if I could make a bag of the tinkers, I d be the most popular (and rich) gnome ever!  IF we get the opportunity to discover a recipe for this, I m sure it
ygData.messageBody:
Damn if I could make a bag of the tinkers, I'd be the most popular (and
rich) gnome ever! IF we get the opportunity to discover a recipe for this,
I'm sure it will also involve tailoring, and lord knows what other
skills....

Cogg - Rallos Zek


----- Original Message -----
From: <cerceta@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, November 26, 1999 9:55 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkered items we know how to make, things we have
therioes on and just rumor


> From: cerceta@...
>
> Ok folks i have searched for a good long time and found a few items I knew
how to make, a few I previously did not know how to make and also a few
theory items. Here goes: Firewater, flameless torch, compass, cams,
lockpicks, spyglass, stalking probs, animated bait, collapsable fishing
pole, aqua lung,
> rebreather, Gem cutter ( if we could get a hold of diamond dust any new
info out there?. Now we come to what is only theory and people ( at least
from what i have read) arn't real sure about..... Thermal cloak ( Tattered
gnomish cloak, metal rods firwater and maybe a belt..) Infered goggles ( no
clue). Here is something that just might make our tinkering worth while....
the tinkerer's bag.
> This bag which can be purchased in Sol A ( only rumor, but from 2 sources)
this item costs 6k plat and has ten slots, everything in the bag is
weightless 100%.
> Does anyone know if WE the tinkerer's of Norath can make this item ?
>
> side note : this was all extracted from the web and a few good tinkerer's
on
> several servers i hope it may be of some use to u all and if there is any
info
> please share it:) where do we buy the third tinkerers book btw?
>
> Sites extracted from: eqportal.com/tinkering/ Grundup
Puddlejumper
> everlore.com Gnome of necromancy
> ect....
>
>
>
>
